name: Magnifistorming Sovereign Tyranny
text:
Once per turn: You can target 3 Quick-Play Spells in your GY, including a "Magnifistorm" card; apply these effects, in sequence.
● Shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
● WIND monsters you control will gain 300 ATK/DEF for the rest of this turn.
Once per Chain, when "Mystical Space Typhoon" is activated: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects. If this card is destroyed by the effect of "Mystical Space Typhoon": You can Set this card.
